transcript.text: shabbat shalom it's saturday morning
june fourth the shabbat of course began
last night as the sunset it is the 28th
day of the second Hebrew month and it's
the 42nd Omer which means we're only a
little more than a week away from Shavit
in fact not tonight as the shabbat ends
but next week as the sabbath day ends
that is when chef wote pentecost begins
hallelujah so you may hear that my voice
is a little more lower and scratchy than
normal and that is because Jerry brother
of mine from khm from the messianic
congregation I go to Jerry and I went
out open our street preaching last night
he he came with me a week ago as well
for the first time on the day of Shabbat
last Saturday afternoon after khn we
went to Pioneer Square and it was so
awesome so awesome having him with me
he's a brother who's from Poland he
emigrated here from Poland in 1984 and
of course my mom's family my mom's side
is from Poland her grandparents were
from Warsaw Poland so it's definitely a
kinship between Jerry and myself his dad
is from Paul and his mom is from Ukraine
but in any case we had a wonderful time
preaching last shabbat and i was so
surprised because I thought he was just
going to come with me and pray and may
in film with the iPad but he was still
such as ill on fire he started preaching
and I put videos of us both preaching
and everything so hopefully you can be
blessed by that Bailey you know I've
been making it a habit to go out and do
open-air street preaching on Shabbat but
today here in Portland it's supposed to
get really really hot 97 98 degrees
maybe I saw one for Cosette 101 degrees
so I thought yeah that's not going to
happen but we thought you know why don't
we go friday night because there's this
huge rose festival going on in downtown
Portland which is where I live Rose
Festival happens once every year and at
the waterfront there's 10
and tons of people down there because
there's a fair going on so Jerry and I
as soon as I got off work and I got my
stuff together for Shabbat Jerry and I
he met me here my apartment and we
walked down to the waterfront and we had
a wonderful wonderful evening of
preaching we got there I don't know
little after six o'clock and stayed
there until 930-10 till dusk so as
literally as the Sabbath was beginning I
had my shofar and blowing it and then he
and I tag-team preached the whole night
and it was it was interesting there were
some people who really responded there
was one guy named Jeremy and he
initially seemed almost I don't know
that he was covered by some bad spirits
that I said he needed deliverance and
then something opened up and we talked
for a while as Jerry was preaching and
and he seems he was mentioning how I
even wanted to be baptized and so I
offered him to come to this shadow
Pentecost gathering that we're going to
be having and maybe he could get
baptized because this week has been a
week of breakthrough there's been some
major breakthrough this week so number
one you know Jerry coming with me and
him started preaching that was of course
last week last shabbat but but that was
a breakthrough and then i got a letter
from pastor al who is the the head of
khm the messianic congregation i go to
and he gave me the go-ahead the green
light to organize this gathering for
both people in khm and anyone else would
like to come and we're going to have a
shallow Panik at cost gathering at this
park in troutdale which is a local
suburb here in Portland Oregon a
beautiful beautiful park rat the mouth
of the gorge and in fact I was there
last gem Kapoor where I did some
baptisms and immersions and so I thought
oh that's going to be a great place if
anyone wants to get immersed and so
we're going to have a gathering there
around noon next sunday june twelfth for
shab vote because we can't do it in our
congregation of building because we
actually meet Anna Baptist Church so
they're going to be doing stuff that
but gathering apart people bring food
testimony time hopefully have some music
some live music because some people have
can play the guitar and and just have a
wonderful gathering so um so I'm excited
about that and i've also been continuing
to go to this park every evening just
having walks and not again not just for
exercise but just times of prayer and
speaking with you i mentioned this last
shabbat having that evening and morning
oblation boy it's just been so
refreshing to do that you know even if i
have a day that's been stressful at work
or things you know have been just kind
of crazy man i go do that in the evening
oh it's just it it clears the mind it
refreshes you it's just it's so
wonderful so again I encourage anyone
out there just like the Levitical
priests to do an evening and a morning
oblation spend some time with yacht in
the evening as the hebrew day begins and
then of course in the morning as you're
starting your day do that it's it's it's
wonderful it's wonderful it definitely
keeps you centered and balanced and
focused on yeah no matter what else is
going on um another breakthrough i guess
is i finally got my website up for my
book which I'm still tweaking and stuff
and I'll have to work on that more after
shabbat but that's another breakthrough
and yeah it's just been it's just been a
week of things really coming to pass
that I've been praying for for a while
it's been gosh I don't know how long but
it's been a while that I've been praying
for a man of you ought to come with me
and for Jerry to come with me and then
want to preach and I mean Jerry has such
a zeal you know and here's just an
example of that so as I was coming home
from work actually before I was coming
home from work I talked with him and I
said hey I'm gonna get some stuff from
Shabbat and I'm gonna get home unload my
groceries maybe have a little dinner and
then i'll i'll call you Jerry well
actually before I even got home Jerry
was already there he was waiting for me
at my apartment so he helped me unload
my groceries I had a little bit I didn't
it was actually good that didn't really
eat because
not really good to eat right before you
go preaching it's almost better just go
on an empty stomach so the spirit can
just flow through you but in any case
just ate a little bit little little bit
of food and then we put the stuff in the

home and I heard Jerry cuz Jerry called

waiting I was like hallelujah hung up
the phone I was just like yeah thank you
for someone who has so much zeal to go
out preaching this is so awesome so
that's that's been a real real real
blessing the ninth Shabbat of the year
number nine number nine means birthing
number nine also is the nine the number
for judgment in Scripture the ninth
Shabbat of the year since the shemitah
year began and here we are in the season
of shavuot of Pentecost this is the
season where the Ruach filled the
apostles to go forth and to preach not
just the word but with power and might
the shadow is also the time when the
Torah was given on Mount Sinai so this
whole season of it is about both his

need his commandments his instructions
as guardrails to keep us in his will we
need his spirit and his ruach for the
power for the boldness but to live holy
to live pure and then to have the signs

disturbance of these things that are so
important when you go street preaching
you know because there are Devils that
manifest when you out street preaching
you have to have discernment and you
have to bind them and do things like
that this is the season for that so we
should be praying and asking yah to help
us grow in his word and in his spirit to
really be equipped to do the things he
wants us to do to be able to effectively
evangelize and witness to be effectively
able to live our lives for him by being
firmly in his word and growing in it and
firmly in his spirit and growing in it
and being transformed more and more into
his image the season of shavuot
Pentecost hallelujah we should be
seeking greater immersions of the of the
Ruach Hakodesh the Holy Spirit we
speaking a greater baptism by fire and
grow always growing in his spirit just
as like we should always be growing in
his word in his Torah in his
instructions learning more about how we

scriptures and that's why my website is
called spirit and Torah calm this is an
exciting season this countdown that
we're in now only what ten nine days
eight days until shav whoa Pentecost
this is the season in which once those

started preaching throughout the summer
and this is what we should be doing we
should be going out you know I heard

whenever a yawn gives you something
you're supposed to give it away he
doesn't just give you something to keep
it he gives it to you to give it away
and by the way that doesn't mean you
charge work when he gives you a
revelation of his truth when he gives

never see before you're supposed to give
that out give it away so it can bless

that's a beautiful a beautiful way to
live life that way anyway you ensure
that the spirits always flowing through
you freely like a river and his words
flowing through you freely like a river
hallelujah well have a wonderful
wonderful shabbat i know i'm very much

resting resting on this what's going to
